name: Dinari HODL
description: The Dinari HODL dShares token (HODL.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the Purpose Bitcoin ETF (HODL), one of the first ETFs to provide regulated exposure to Bitcoin by directly holding physical Bitcoin in a secure custody arrangement. Each HODL.d token is fully backed by a corresponding HODL ETF share securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. Leveraging blockchain technology, HODL.d provides investors with fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity for Bitcoin exposure through a regulated ETF structure.
